includedAssets.title: Parallax
includedAssets.synopsis: The second season of the acclaimed US drama. The ramifications of Masters' disastrous presentation continue to ripple.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The second season of the acclaimed US drama. The ramifications of Masters' disastrous presentation continue to ripple.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The second season of the acclaimed US drama. The ramifications of Masters' disastrous presentation continue to ripple.

includedAssets.title: Kyrie Eleison
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters begins a new job, only to find his boss insisting he leave Johnson behind.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters begins a new job, only to find his boss insisting he leave Johnson behind.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters begins a new job, only to find his boss insisting he leave Johnson behind.

includedAssets.title: Fight
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters delivers a baby with ambiguous genitalia. Later, he meets Johnson at a hotel and opens up about his troubled childhood.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters delivers a baby with ambiguous genitalia. Later, he meets Johnson at a hotel and opens up about his troubled childhood.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters delivers a baby with ambiguous genitalia. Later, he meets Johnson at a hotel and opens up about his troubled childhood.

includedAssets.title: Dirty Jobs
includedAssets.synopsis: Langham spots Masters and Johnson leaving a hotel and shares his suspicions with DePaul, putting Johnson's job on the line.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Langham spots Masters and Johnson leaving a hotel and shares his suspicions with DePaul, putting Johnson's job on the line.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Langham spots Masters and Johnson leaving a hotel and shares his suspicions with DePaul, putting Johnson's job on the line.

includedAssets.title: Giants
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters continues to break ground as a white physician at a hospital for black patients, but at the cost of his gynaecology practice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters continues to break ground as a white physician at a hospital for black patients, but at the cost of his gynaecology practice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters continues to break ground as a white physician at a hospital for black patients, but at the cost of his gynaecology practice.

includedAssets.title: Blackbird
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters contacts a journalist after he is banned from using black participants in his study.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters contacts a journalist after he is banned from using black participants in his study.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters contacts a journalist after he is banned from using black participants in his study.

includedAssets.title: Asterion
includedAssets.synopsis: When Masters learns Johnson has continued to have relationships with other men, he cuts off their joint participation in the study.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Masters learns Johnson has continued to have relationships with other men, he cuts off their joint participation in the study.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Masters learns Johnson has continued to have relationships with other men, he cuts off their joint participation in the study.

includedAssets.title: Mirror, Mirror
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters treats a couple for infertility. Johnson gets in over her head when she attempts to treat a patient on her own.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters treats a couple for infertility. Johnson gets in over her head when she attempts to treat a patient on her own.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters treats a couple for infertility. Johnson gets in over her head when she attempts to treat a patient on her own.

includedAssets.title: Story Of My Life
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep9 - Story Of My Life
includedAssets.synopsis: Lester is angered when Betty and Masters hire a prostitute to attempt to remedy his impotence. Masters and Johnson clash.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Lester is angered when Betty and Masters hire a prostitute to attempt to remedy his impotence. Masters and Johnson clash.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Lester is angered when Betty and Masters hire a prostitute to attempt to remedy his impotence. Masters and Johnson clash.

includedAssets.title: Below The Belt
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters learns of a rival study and recruits a public relations expert to help brand his work with Johnson.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters learns of a rival study and recruits a public relations expert to help brand his work with Johnson.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters learns of a rival study and recruits a public relations expert to help brand his work with Johnson.

includedAssets.title: One For The Money, Two For The Show
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep11 - One For The Money, Two For The Show
includedAssets.synopsis: A TV crew arrive at the clinic to document Masters and Johnson's work treating sexual dysfunction.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A TV crew arrive at the clinic to document Masters and Johnson's work treating sexual dysfunction.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A TV crew arrive at the clinic to document Masters and Johnson's work treating sexual dysfunction.

includedAssets.title: The Revolution Will Not Be Televised
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep12 - The Revolution Will Not Be Televised
includedAssets.synopsis: Masters watches a cut of the documentary and is disturbed by how his work is portrayed. Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Masters watches a cut of the documentary and is disturbed by how his work is portrayed. Season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Masters watches a cut of the documentary and is disturbed by how his work is portrayed. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Second season of the acclaimed US drama. Bill and Virginia try to resume their personal and professional relationship, while both must deal with Bill’s new job and the financial strain on their research. Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan star.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Season two of the acclaimed drama. Bill and Virginia try to resume their personal and professional relationship. Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan star.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Second season of the acclaimed US drama. Bill and Virginia try to resume their personal and professional relationship, while both must deal with Bill’s new job and the financial strain on their research. Michael Sheen and Lizzy Caplan star.

includedIn.title: Masters of Sex
includedIn.synopsis: Dr William Masters, a respected Washington University physician, runs a successful medical practice by day and conducts a secret study of human sexuality by night. When uninhibited former nightclub singer Virginia Johnson joins the hospital staff, she quickly proves herself to be an asset to Masters' work. Together, their research sparks the sexual revolution and takes them from their St Louis teaching hospital to the cover of Time magazine and beyond.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A respected doctor and his uninhibited research associate pioneer a secret study of human sexuality.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: Dr William Masters, a respected Washington University physician, runs a successful medical practice by day and conducts a secret study of human sexuality by night. When uninhibited former nightclub singer Virginia Johnson joins the hospital staff, she quickly proves herself to be an asset to Masters' work. Together, their research sparks the sexual revolution and takes them from their St Louis teaching hospital to the cover of Time magazine and beyond.
